mapper.select: SELECT resource.* FROM auth_user u LEFT JOIN auth_user_role u_role ON u.userid = u_role.user_id LEFT JOIN auth_role role ON u_role.role_id = role.id LEFT JOIN auth_resources_role resource_role ON resource_role.ROLE_ID = role.id LEFT JOIN auth_resources resource ON resource.id = resource_role.RESC_ID where u.username = #{username} order by resource.paixu asc
